name: Alice Morgan
experience: She has led cross-functional teams for over 8 years in industries ranging from e-commerce to fintech.
description:
Alice Morgan (alice.morgan@productlabs.io) is a seasoned product manager based in Amsterdam. 
She has led cross-functional teams for over 8 years in industries ranging from e-commerce to fintech. 
Alice has strong skills in Agile methodology, stakeholder communication, and roadmapping. 
She previously worked at Booking.com, Stripe, and two local Dutch startups. 
Outside of work, she’s passionate about ethical design, behavioral economics, and marathon running.

name: Carlos Mendes
experience: 7+ years of experience building SaaS platforms and high-performance web apps for startups across the US and Europe. Delivered end-to-end apps for clients in healthtech, edtech, and travel, including a real-time collaboration platform for a YC-backed company.
description:
Carlos Mendes (carlos.m@webflowcraft.com) is a full-stack JavaScript engineer working remotely from Porto, Portugal. 
With 7+ years of experience, Carlos builds SaaS platforms and high-performance web apps for startups across the US and Europe. 
He specializes in React, Node.js, Next.js, and PostgreSQL, and is a contributor to the React Hook Form library. 
Carlos has delivered end-to-end apps for clients in healthtech, edtech, and travel — including a real-time collaboration platform for a YC-backed company. 
Before freelancing full-time, he worked at OutSystems as a frontend lead. 
Carlos is deeply interested in developer experience (DX), micro frontends, and performance optimization. 
He also teaches advanced TypeScript workshops and runs a YouTube channel focused on debugging and testing patterns.

name: Dr. Elena Petrova
experience: Elena is currently leading a research group at NeuralX AI Labs, focusing on foundation models, federated learning, and low-resource language models. She has published papers at NeurIPS and ICML and collaborated on multilingual benchmark development.
description:
Dr. Elena Petrova (elena.petrova@neuralx.ai) is an AI research scientist based in Zurich, Switzerland. 
She holds a Ph.D. in Machine Learning from ETH Zurich, where her dissertation focused on transformer interpretability and multilingual embeddings. 
Elena has published papers at NeurIPS and ICML and is currently leading a research group at NeuralX AI Labs, where she focuses on foundation models, federated learning, and low-resource language models. 
She has collaborated with Hugging Face and DeepMind on multilingual benchmark development. 
Elena's skills include PyTorch, Hugging Face Transformers, TensorFlow, and fastai. 
She speaks five languages fluently, mentors early-career female researchers, and is an advocate for open science and ethical AI.

name: John Doe
description:
John Doe (john.doe@tech.com) is a backend engineer based in Berlin. He has experience
with Kubernetes, Python, and cloud infrastructure. Formerly worked
at Google and loves open-source.

name: Josh Lee
experience: He helps build communities and educates engineers about cloud-native tooling. Formerly at HashiCorp, now working with multiple open-source foundations.
description:
Josh Lee is a Developer Advocate working remotely from the UK. He helps build communities and educates engineers about cloud-native tooling.
Josh loves speaking at meetups, producing YouTube content, and writing documentation. 
Formerly at HashiCorp, now working with multiple open-source foundations.
His email is josh@devrel.io.

name: Dr. Kunal Sharma
experience: Focusing on machine learning for healthcare with a PhD in AI from ETH Zurich
description:
Meet Dr. Kunal Sharma (k.sharma@ai.research.org), a Berlin-based data scientist focusing on machine learning for healthcare.
Kunal has a PhD in AI from ETH Zurich and previously contributed to research teams at DeepMind and Novartis. 
His key skills include Python, PyTorch, NLP, and biomedical data modeling. 
In his free time, Kunal enjoys long hikes, jazz piano, and open science advocacy.

name: Michael Anderson
experience: Over 10 years of experience in CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Leads infrastructure-as-code initiatives using Terraform and Kubernetes at CloudOps.
description:
Michael Anderson (michael.anderson@cloudops.io) is a senior DevOps engineer currently living in Austin, Texas. 
He has over 10 years of experience in CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, and automation, and is certified in both AWS and GCP. 
Michael began his career as a systems administrator at IBM, then transitioned to a cloud architect role at Netflix. 
At his current role at CloudOps, he leads infrastructure-as-code initiatives using Terraform and Kubernetes, and has reduced deployment times by 40%. 
His technical toolkit includes Docker, Jenkins, Helm, Prometheus, and Bash scripting. 
In his free time, Michael contributes to open-source monitoring tools and enjoys mentoring junior engineers through TechBridge.

name: :null,
description: `The sun is shining and it's a beautiful day for a walk in the park.`

name: Sarah Smith
description:
`Sarah Smith (sarah@frontend.dev) is a frontend developer from San Francisco. 
    She specializes in React, TypeScript, and UI/UX design. 
    Previously worked at Meta and Airbnb. She's passionate about accessibility and performance optimization.`

name: Yossi Cohen
interests: exploring new markets in global food culture
experience: Over a decade of experience leading innovation and growth initiatives across food tech startups and large-scale production companies.
description:
Meet Yossi Cohen, an Israel-based entrepreneur and product strategist in the food industry.
With over a decade of experience, Yossi has led innovation and growth initiatives across food tech startups and large-scale production companies. 
His expertise spans supply chain optimization, food safety compliance, sustainable packaging, and consumer trend analysis.
Yossi is passionate about bridging culinary tradition with modern technology, and in his free time, he enjoys Mediterranean cooking, mentoring young founders, and exploring new markets in global food culture.
